alert.note: Alert for Garfield; Loup (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 25 at 9:50PM CDT until July 25 at 10:15PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...A TORNADO WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1015 PM CDT FOR CENTRAL LOUP AND WESTERN GARFIELD COUNTIES... At 949 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located 7 miles northwest of Taylor, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Tornado and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. This dangerous storm will be near... Taylor and Calamus Reservoir State Recreation Area around 1005 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this tornadic thunderstorm include Nunda Shoal Campground, Homestead Knolls Campground, Valley View Flat Campground, Horseshoe Bend Lake and Hannamon Bayou Campground. This includes Highway 183 between mile markers 123 and 141. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN
info.instruction: Tornadoes are extremely difficult to see and confirm at night. Do not wait to see or hear the tornado. TAKE COVER NOW!
